body.name: Koonie Waist Clip Fan Portable with Light, 10000mAh Rechargeable Hands-free Personal Body fan Lasts 30hrs, USB Port Power Supply, 3 Speeds Under Shirt Fan for Outdoor Works, Farm, Camping, Travel
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 5 hrs 27 mins
features: Powerful Cool Air Delivery: Koonie's all-in-one airflow system combines with a brushless DC motor, delivering high-speed, brisk cool up to 18mft/s. Designed with 3 extra air inlets and concentrated outlets, this upgraded waist clip fan maximizes the wind and beats the heat in seconds.

Reassuring Battery Capacity: 10,000mAh battery offers up to 30 hours of continuous airflow on a full charge, keeping you cool for days. And this rechargeable personal fan takes only 3 hours to fully charge, so you'll always be ready to go with your powerful yet portable body fan.

Stable at its Finest: Featuring sleek metal clips, this belt clip undershirt fan is specially designed to wear comfortably while also preventing bending and breaking. Always keep the wearable fan firmly in place and ensure that it won't slip or fall off during use.

Reliable Mobile Charger: The high-performance battery pack can charge your phone or earbuds 2-3 times. Whether you're camping, hiking, or enjoying any other outdoor activity, our portable waist fan will keep you cool while ensuring that you stay connected at all times.

LED & SOS Light: Built in versatile LED light that can be used as a night light for your camping night or as an SOS signal in emergencies. Our portable cooling fan provides a pleasant and refreshing breeze as well as peace of mind during outdoor adventures.

Built for Last: The premium TPU coating and extra-thick edges enhance the protection against falls. Upgraded with stylish covers to protect the ports against water and dust, this clip on body fan for outdoor works is specially designed for long-lasting use in any situation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great product and working very well, last for hours and keep me cool

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Don't get confused with the functions of this product
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This has been a game changer I work for a lawn company in FL and this summer has been cruel. it keeps me at a stable temperature while weed whacking little sweat but no where near the three soaked shirts before I bought this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for being outside in Florida
reviews.reviewText: It would be nice if it were a bit lighter and thinner but that could only be accomplished with a reduction in battery size.It works great in blowing air up your shirt, I would suggest that it works best with a loose fitting shirt that allows the air to flow freely out the sleeves and neck. Positioning the fan to blow up your back may cause discomfort in certain situations, it has a tendency to fill your shirt with released gas after eating high fiber foods. The best cooling effect can be achieved by use of a thigh strap and clipping the bottom loose fitting shorts to the shirt-clip. Going “Commando” maximizes the effect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Product is not working
reviews.reviewText: This product did a great job when it was working. However, I only used it a few times with plenty of airflow on the intake side. Then it just stopped working. I made sure I fully charged it. However it still did not turn on. The green light indicator, showing that it is charged, is lit but it still doesn’t turn on. Please issue a refund or replacement. Thank You.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: THIS FAN IS VERY HELPFUL TO OUR WELDERS TO KEEP THEM COOL AS THEY ARE WORKING. AIR FLOW IS REALLY GOOD EVEN ON LOW THAT WILL EXTEND THE BATTERY CHARGE. WOULD PURCHASE AGAIN.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Keeps me cool and bugs away!
reviews.reviewText: This portable fan is really powerful for the size of it. It helped keep me cool in the summer months and scared the bugs away. You can also charge other devices with it. I think its cool that you can carry it by its handle or clip it to you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It help a little

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Summertime game changer!
reviews.reviewText: Wow, this is more powerful than I expected! It blows cold air and feels amazing. The battery lasted long enough for me to mow the lawn (front and back) with a push mower. It's a little heavy, but totally worth it for how it helps to keep you cool. It doesn't take very long to charge, and is fairly sturdy. Would purchase again!
